citations.narrative:
* Accumulations of dirt, debris and dried excreta were observed collecting in the cracks formed in the cement
floor in one enclosure housing one dog. Unsanitary conditions exist from a lack of cleaning of the surface area that
could lead to potential disease, contamination or health risks. The licensee must maintain all surfaces on a regular
basis and any surface that cannot be readily cleaned and sanitized, must be replaced when soiled or worn. Correct
by 12/3/15.
* The facility inspection and exit briefing done on 11/3/15 were conducted with the licensee.
* Copy of the inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.

narrative:
3.1(c)(2)
HOUSING FACILITIES, GENERAL.
*     Accumulations of dirt, debris and dried excreta were observed collecting in the cracks formed in the cement
floor in one enclosure housing one dog.  Unsanitary conditions exist from a lack of cleaning of the surface area that
could lead to potential disease, contamination or health risks.  The licensee must maintain all surfaces on a regular
basis and any surface that cannot be readily cleaned and sanitized, must be replaced when soiled or worn.  Correct
by 12/3/15.
*  The facility inspection and exit briefing done on 11/3/15 were conducted with the licensee.
*  Copy of the inspection report was sent by certified and regular mail.
